email.tip: Mask or obfuscate emails in logs/code unless strictly required; avoid storing in repos.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — APP 11 (Security of personal information)

aws_access_key.tip: Rotate immediately; revoke if exposed; move to a secrets manager; purge from history.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — APP 11 (Security of personal information)
Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — Notifiable Data Breaches (NDB) scheme, Part IIIC

aws_secret_access_key.tip: Revoke/rotate immediately; store only in a managed secrets vault; purge from history.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — NDB scheme, Part IIIC

gcp_service_account_key.tip: Recreate the key; restrict IAM; store in Google Secret Manager; remove from repo history.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — NDB scheme, Part IIIC

azure_client_secret.tip: Rotate the client secret; use Azure Key Vault; remove from source control history.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — NDB scheme, Part IIIC

ssh_private_key.tip: Remove private keys from repos; rotate dependent keys; store via SSH agent or vault.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — NDB scheme, Part IIIC

jwt_secret.tip: Rotate signing secrets/tokens; never commit to code; load from env or a secrets store.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — NDB scheme, Part IIIC

api_token.tip: Regenerate and scope minimally; store in a secrets manager; remove from history.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — NDB scheme, Part IIIC

password.tip: Remove hard-coded passwords; rotate immediately; use env vars or a vault.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — NDB scheme, Part IIIC

credit_card.tip: Never store card numbers in code; use a tokenisation/payment provider; treat as an incident if exposed.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — Notifiable Data Breaches (NDB) scheme, Part IIIC
GDPR Art. 33/34 — Personal data breach notification

ssn.tip: Remove or mask SSNs; handle only within strictly controlled, compliant systems.
compliance: California Civil Code § 1798.85 — SSN confidentiality (if applicable)

phone_number.tip: Obfuscate where possible; avoid logging full numbers; limit retention.

ip_address.tip: Anonymise or truncate IPs where feasible; avoid storing long-term.
compliance: GDPR Art. 4(1) — Personal data definition (when identifiable)

database_connection_string.tip: Remove credentials from code; use env vars or a secrets manager; rotate compromised passwords.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — NDB scheme, Part IIIC

tfn.tip: Never store TFNs in source or logs; restrict access; remove from repo history; secure at rest and in transit.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — APP 11 (Security of personal information)
Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — Notifiable Data Breaches (Part IIIC)

medicare_number.tip: Treat Medicare numbers as sensitive; minimise collection; avoid code/logs; secure storage and transmission.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — APP 11 (Security of personal information)
Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — Notifiable Data Breaches (Part IIIC)

drivers_licence_number.tip: Do not commit to repos; mask in logs; restrict access; rotate/replace if exposed per jurisdictional guidance.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — APP 11 (Security of personal information)
Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — Notifiable Data Breaches (Part IIIC)

address_au_with_pii.tip: Treat full addresses combined with other identifiers as sensitive; mask or remove; restrict access and retention.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — APP 11 (Security of personal information)
Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — Notifiable Data Breaches (Part IIIC)

name_full.tip: Mask or omit full names in code/logs unless strictly required; minimise collection and retention.
compliance: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) — APP 11 (Security of personal information)
